title: Aardman classics [DVD]
abstract: Pib & Pog (1994, 6 min)--Minotaur and little Nerkin (1999, 2 mins)--Wat's Pig (1996, 11 min)--My Baby just cares for me (1987, 3 min)--Stage Fright (1997, 11 min)--HumDrum (1998, 7 min)--Pop (1996, 3 mins)--Owzat (1997, 5 mins)--Adam (1991, 6 mins)--Indent (1989, 5 mins)--Al Dente (1998, 2 mins)--Loves me, loves me not (1992, 8 mins)--Babylon (1986, 15 mins)--Next (1989, 5 mins)--On Probation (1981, 5 mins)--Sales pitch (1981, 5 mins)--Palmy days (1981, 5 mins)--Early bird (1981, 5 mins)--Late edition (1981, 5 mins)--Confessions of a foyer girl (1978, 5 mins)--Down & out (1978, 5 mins)--Going equipped (1989, 5 mins)--Not without my handbag (1993, 12 mins)
description: Compilation of early Aardman short works, ranging from 1978-1999. Aardman, the animation studio specialising in claymation, are renowned for their humour, especially in relation to the portrayal of animals. Highlights here include "Pib and Pog" and "My baby just cares for me".
